item.title: Sources: Sorsby, top portal QB, to visit TTU, LSU
item.description: Quarterback Brendan Sorsby, the top player in the transfer portal, will visit Texas Tech and LSU, sources told ESPN. Sorsby combined for 36 touchdowns...

item.title: Diggs, Barmore decline to discuss facing charges

item.title: Vikings to start QB McCarthy in season finale
item.description: Vikings quarterback J.J. McCarthy will start the team's final game of the season Sunday against the Green Bay Packers, coach Kevin O'Connell said Frid...

item.title: Ravens give 13-year vet NT Jenkins 1st extension
item.description: The Ravens and nose tackle John Jenkins have agreed to a one-year extension. It is the first contract extension in Jenkins' 13-year NFL career.

item.title: U.S. unveils 4 Nations-heavy roster for Olympics
